column4: hello to all in the room.. I am trying to install ubuntu on my 1 GB usb key so I can boot to ubuntu.. has anyone here done this yet ? How did it go ?
so far I'm following several instuctions
hi, i am doing exactly the same thing, look here => http://nsaunders.wordpress.com/2006/11/06/a-usb-stick-grub-and-ubuntu/
don't follow several instructions, bookmaark them all, then work through them 1 at a time, until it fails or succeeds
